channel.title: Please Help Commands Don't Work For Players*Fixed*

item.title: Please Help Commands Don't Work For Players*Fixed*
item.dc:creator: @wrathy wrathy
item.description:
@wrathy wrote:

Hi when i’m making commands for my server they dont work for the players, only for the staff

example of a player-working command:
if (playerCommand.equalsIgnoreCase(“commands”)) {
c.getPA().showInterface(8134);
c.getPA().sendFrame126("~ DivinePK Commands ~",8144);
}

Normal command not working for players:
if (playerCommand.startsWith(“home”)) {
if (c.inPvP() || c.inWild() || c.inDT() || BountyHunter.inBH©|| c.safeTimer > 0)
return;
c.getPA().movePlayer(3185, 3435, 0);
c.sendMessage(“Welcome @blu@Home@bla@!”);
}

please help thanks

Nevermind fixed it by moving it higher up in commands.java sorry

Read full topic
item.source: Please Help Commands Don't Work For Players*Fixed*
